Years later, a young woman, Dr. Sri Vidya, enters Sonu's life and he befriends her and her dad, so much so that he even aids them financially.
title: Super

overview: A single mother battles her past demons to safeguard her child's future, facing daunting challenges to shield her daughter from imminent danger.
title: Sabari

overview: Arjun and Anu are fraternal twins who manage to run a scam in the US from India via a call center. With police officer Kumar hot on their heels, will they manage to escape the system?
title: Mosagallu

overview: Geetha is a dumb orphan girl who runs an orphanage with the support of her childhood deaf friend Valli. Upcoming politician Bhagwan is with cruel mentality runs a medical mafia that does business with orphan children's organs. Geetha tries to expose Bhagwan's Mafia to public with the help of police officer Saradhi.
title: Geetha

overview: When terrorists hijack a plane from Chennai, a struggle with the pilots damages the engine forcing them to make an emergency landing in Tirupati. NSG commando Ravi is entrusted with rescue operations.
title: Gaganam

overview: Two innocent lovers must unwillingly sacrifice their love as their families belong to two different castes and religions.
title: Sampangi

overview: Raja, an orphaned thief, dies while helping a gang in kidnapping a wealthy heiress, Mahi, in exchange of money. He then lands in Yamlok and fights with Yama, the god of death, to get his life back.
title: Yamadonga

overview: Sita is a materialistic woman who only cares about materialistic gains and nothing else. MLA Basava Raju lusts for her and wants her to give him what she promised him for helping her. The villain of their tale is Ram, a man who’s way too innocent for his own good. How does Ram help Sita out of the fix she’s in forms the crux of the story.
title: Sita

overview: Vajrayudham is a 1985 Indian Telugu film, directed by K. Raghavendra Rao and Produced by K.Lingamurthy. The film stars Krishna, Sridevi and Rao Gopalarao in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Chakravarthy.
title: Vajrayudham

overview: An extremely talented DJ who works at a local night club gets himself in an adventure where he must fight all odds to survive.
title: Thipparaa Meesam

overview: Venky, who aspires to become a newsreader, must face the challenges posed by his boss, Uday. Things get worse when Uday seeks Venky's help to woo a girl in return for his desired post.
title: Oohalu Gusagusalade

overview: Indu makes her boyfriend Krishna act like her friend Bhoomi's lover so that her family will stop searching for a groom. However, their lives takes a turn when Bhoomi falls in love with Krishna.
title: Brindavanam

overview: Karthik seeks revenge after Bhanumati refuses to hire him despite his qualifications. When he vows to marry one of her two daughters, Bhanumati hires a bodyguard for them.
title: Naa Alludu

overview: Sreram, an idealist recovering from heartbreak, and Seetha, an independent fashion designer facing setbacks, both cross paths on a cruise on the Godavari River.
title: Godavari

overview: Two Telugu-speaking friends with opposing views towards life work at a construction site in Bhubaneswar, Odisha. When one of them dies of a heart attack, the other takes it upon himself to take the body to his friend’s village for last rites. What did he have to endure and experience during the journey, and how did it transform him?
title: Anukoni Prayanam

overview: Three friends who are desperate to become actors meet a filmmaker who tells them he will hire them if they find a heroine. The three then bump into Kokila, a journalist who was going to expose a drug lord and his gang members but has recently lost her memory. The misunderstandings lead to a series of hilarious situations that will keep you laughing till the end.
title: Bhagya Nagara Veedhullo Gammathu

overview: When his wife announces a surprise pregnancy, a man decides to sue the condom company he deems responsible.
title: Janaka Aithe Ganaka

overview: Intelligent revenge story by two friends on greedy money lender.
title: Santosham

overview: Blade Babji (Allari Naresh) is a pickpocket who takes up the mission of earning 4 crores to rescue the slum dwellers in his area from a builder. He and his gang go to Vizag and rob a bank. And they hide the loot in a building under construction. They were forced to go away for a month and when they return they find a police control room at the spot where they hidden their loot. In order to retrieve the loot, Blade Babji takes the position of newly joined Krishna Manohar (spoof of Pokiri) by kidnapping him. The rest of the story is all about the comedy of errors that followed.
title: Blade Babji

overview: A mother and her teen daughter from a middle-class background, whose humble life goes upside down, when the daughter gets possessed by a ghost and her single mother seeks the help of their cowardly neighbour.
title: Masooda

overview: An alcoholic ex-cop lives a somewhat peaceful life with his pampered daughter. An unfortunate incident forces him to lead an investigation again.
title: Shekar

overview: After the Pandavas are forcefully exiled by their enemies, they must get together and fight back in order to reclaim their land.
title: Pandava Vanavasamu

overview: A young man faces immense pressure from his family to move to America, get a job and have his life settled abroad.
title: Pressure Cooker

overview: Sitaram, the son of a rich man, is robbed of his wealth by his enemies. Later, he is wrongly arrested for murder but manages to get out of jail and avenges the injustice done to him and his family.
title: Alludaa Majakaa

overview: Bhatti Vikramarka (transl. Bhatti and Vikramarka) is a 1960 Indian Telugu-language swashbuckling adventure film based on the life of King Vikramaditya.
title: Bhatti Vikramarka

overview: Raju, a reckless guy from a village, escapes to Hyderabad after a fight with a local leader’s son. Raju saves  Shukla ,a good hearted wealthy girl  from some thugs. Shukla introduces Raju to her father and hires him as a driver. And so their acquaintance leads to love.
title: Gaalodu

overview: A man goes in search of some urgently required answers to the world of Bhairavakona, from which there's seemingly no way out.
title: Ooru Peru Bhairavakona

overview: While the nation is terrorized by a slew of kidnappings and murders, a young woman falls in love with a mysterious man; not realizing that he is the one who went to jail for the murder of her parents, thirteen years earlier.
title: Athidhi

overview: Two neighbors study in the same college, but hate each other immensely. A series of events changes their feelings when they unknowingly write to each other under alias names.
title: Anandam

overview: During the Hyderabad Liberation Movement of 1948, there will be atrocities, like the episode of Gundrampally, Parkala, Bhairanpally villages.
title: Razakar: The Silent Genocide of Hyderabad

overview: A happy-go-lucky Shobhan tries to help his friend improve his love life until things become complicated for both of them and tests their friendship.
title: Speedunnodu

overview: "Show Time" is a gripping thriller that explores how an accidental murder shatters the lives of a middle-class family. The story follows a seemingly ordinary family whose world turns upside down when a momentary lapse in judgment leads to an unintended crime. As they struggle to cover up the incident, they are pulled into a web of lies, guilt, and paranoia, testing their bonds and morals.
title: Show Time

overview: Three mechanics in a car company are wayward husbands. Their weakness lies in drinking and spending half of their salary on the unnecessary items. Their wives have a tough time running their houses with the meager money provided by their men. Their world is turned upside down by a couple who move in next door.
title: Kshemanga Velli Labhamga Randi

overview: Lakshmi Narasimha is a Vijayawada police officer who agrees to take bribes for the betterment of the city.
title: Lakshmi Narasimha

overview: Two Town Rowdy is a 1989 Telugu film directed by Dasari Narayana Rao. The film stars Venkatesh, Radha, Krishnam Raju and Mohan Babu in lead roles.
title: Two Town Rowdy

overview: Tammy ‘hates boys’ and will only settle for the kind of standards her father sets for her; both with the way he is and the 'knowledge' he imparts her with. Sanju is one of the men she dates, a man-child who refuses to grow up. But when both part ways on such uncertain terms, what brings them together again?
title: Next Enti?

overview: An egotistical music teacher envious of the extraordinary talent of his prodigious young disciple.
title: Swathi Kiranam

overview: A woman finds out that her husband is having an affair with an old college friend of hers. Soon, they hatch a plan to teach him a lesson.
title: Pellaniki Premalekha Priyuraliki Subhalekha

overview: Torn between toxic marriages, Narendra, a renowned actor, and his co-star Parvathi fall in love and desire escape, freedom, and a peaceful life together. However, their love affair runs into trouble owing to a conspiracy.
title: Malli Pelli

overview: Maharaja Sharminder Bhupathi of Avanti and his wife, the Rajmata, would like to see peace in the region, and would like their daughter, Alaknanda, to marry the prince of Gandharva, Aditya Vardhan.
title: Simhasanam

overview: The story of Anarkali and Saleem retold.
title: Akbar Saleem Anarkali

overview: A man's attempts to repay a kindness earns him the wrath of a ruthless gangster who just wants to be left alone to continue his illegal dealings.
title: Jakkanna

overview: An intelligent young man and a timid cop team up to catch a criminal who wants revenge after a foiled bank robbery.
title: Julayi

overview: Arjun aka Ramakrishna is a RAW marshall from Delhi who has a 100% success rate at nabbing terrorists. What happens when he makes enemies out of India's most wanted Ibrahim Qureshi and his son Sohail?
title: Chanakya

overview: Two different gangs, one with Chaitanya, an aspiring filmmaker and his friend Harsha and another gang with Bar Seenu and his partner Parvathy, try to kidnap the same person which unfolds a big conspiracy.
title: Parijatha Parvam

overview: Nani is a flower decorator, madly in love with his neighbor Bindhu. He gets killed by the baddie, Sudeep, a powerful businessman. Nani comes back as a housefly to get his revenge.
title: Eega

overview: During a Ganesh Chaturthi celebration, Ganesh, a small-time thief decides to take up a big heist that goes awry, leading to a comical clash with Rudra and his boss Kishore Reddy, who are also searching for a valuable item amidst the festive chaos.
title: Gam Gam Ganesha

overview: In London, Dev, an overweight, genius chef who suffers with muscle spasms, meets Tara and love blossoms, but things take an interesting turn when he crosses paths with Maya.
title: Ninnila Ninnila

overview: Varun, an insurance agent, meets Meghna, the daughter of a wealthy businessman, over a marriage policy. Their interaction leads to sharing some details about their respective relationships. Circumstances that follow and their failed relationships make them meet more often, and it opens a door for the Cupid to strike. But can love happen more than once, or is it just a rebound?
title: Neetho

overview: Veeravenkata Satyanarayana Swamy a.k.a. Satyam (Nandamuri Balakrishna) is a beloved person for several villagers, having touched and changed many a life. His grandmother is Baby (Simran Bagga) whose husband dedicated his life to gain independence, taken later as a prisoner of war and missing henceforth. Meanwhile, corrupt doctors, lawyers and journalists are allegedly killed, but their bodies are missing. The suspicions are on Swamy who is arrested, but an old man calling himself Okka Magadu (Nandamuri Balakrishna) claims to have committed those acts. The point is, OM looks like the older version of Swamy whose sworn enemy is Namboodriyar(Ashutosh Rana), a politician whose son elopes with a middle-class girl under Swamy's protection. The story line is very much similar to that of the film Bharateyudu (Indian (1996 film)) starred by the iconic actor Kamal Haasan.Movie was a blockbuster hit.
title: Okka Magaadu

overview: A young lady, who is in a live-in relationship with the man she loves, has to deal with an obsessive, controlling father who takes pride in the way he raises his daughter. How the two youngsters manage to convince him about and accept their love for each other forms the crux of the story.
title: Manchi Rojulochaie

overview: Nirmala is separated from her millionaire father in childhood. Years later, she marries Krishna, but fate separates them when she is pregnant with his child.
title: Vidhi Vilasam

overview: Meenakshi is a disillusioned classical dancer. With the support of her neighbor Chandram, a painter who admires her talent, she begins a journey to appreciate and celebrate her art.
title: Swarnakamalam

overview: A stingy miser gets the shock of his life when a nation-wide lock-down thwarts his attempts for a cost-effective marriage.
title: Vivaha Bhojanambu

overview: After witnessing the cruel sacrifice of his childhood friend, an atheist warrior rejects religion until love forces him to find his own faith.
title: Kannappa

overview: Virat is a new-age baba with a book of slokas that recite how singlehood is the best way of life and a bunch of loyal followers. But what happens when he gets a taste of his own medicine?
title: Solo Brathuke So Better

overview: Set in 1970s Abhinaya Vasudev, an orphaned and happy-go-lucky postman, treats the Krishnagiri village populace as his extended family. When several women missing and Vasudev’s loved one is nearly abducted, he is determined to find answers.
title: KA

overview: When all hope died, Akhanda arrived. He saved his family, protected his people, killed the wrongdoers, and retreated into isolation. But years later, new threats emerge putting the world in danger. And as the world burns, Akhanda returns.
title: Akhanda 2: Thaandavam

overview: Aditya is a death row prisoner facing charges of terrorism. His only hope for living lies in the game of chess.
title: Check

overview: A man who leads a happy and harmonious life with his beloved wife is mistakenly shot at by encounter specialists. Thereafter, he is framed as a Maoist and imprisoned. Can he and his wife find a way to prove his innocence and avenge the injustice committed against them?
title: Shock

overview: Surya has a rare genetic disorder that is deadly if he is exposed to sunlight. To prevent this from happening, Surya lives his life by night. When he falls in love with Sanjana, things become complicated for them both.
title: Surya Vs Surya

overview: Khalindra, a wealthy businessman takes care of his two brothers, after their parents' are murdered. Later, the brothers seek revenge for their parents' death. Will the trio succeed in their mission?
title: Mugguru Kodukulu

overview: When a stuntman is mistaken for a police officer, he begins fighting crime.
title: Bruce Lee - The Fighter

overview: Set in Narayankhed in 2001, Power Star Pawan Kalyan’s Kushi is scheduled to be released and Srinu, a hardcore fan of Power Star has a mission — to get the tickets for the first show. His quest turns even more intense when Laya, the girl of his dreams from his class, decides to watch the first show with him. Now, it turns into a race against time and upholding the word he had given to Laya.
title: First Day First Show

overview: A smart and young chap knots into a big trouble: he must defy a big time goon, to retrieve something priceless and gain back his love.
title: Bhaag Saale

overview: Chandu and Swathi are Software engineers. Chandu is an average guy who never misses an opportunity to impress Swathi. Once Swathi recognizes Chandu's honesty and innocence, the affair begins. Suddenly they find themselves stuck in a major problem. Can Chandu save Swathi?
title: Software Sudheer

overview: Kamesh, a young man travelling to Kaasi, sees Swapna, an NRI, at a railway station and falls in love with her. When Swapna returns to the US, Kamesh fights all odds to follow suit and win her love.
title: Okariki Okaru

overview: A man claims to be the long-lost brother of three sisters, returning to help improve their lives. His true identity, and the intention behind his scheme, is revealed in a Rayalaseema-set flashback.
title: Samarasimha Reddy

overview: A football player unleashes his rage when his sister goes missing one day is found married to a man harassing her.
title: Kalyan Ram Kathi

overview: Chakri is framed in multiple murder cases and sent to jail. On release from prison, he heads to the village to bring to book the real culprits.
title: Amma Donga!

overview: Sivaji and his family are uprooted from their community in Sri Lanka and wind up as bonded labourers in Vishakhapatnam. Like his legendary namesake, he rises up to become the saviour of the oppressed.
title: Chatrapathi

overview: Raghu Ramayya is a man with limited time to live. His children, who all live elsewhere, struggle to schedule their time around his death. But what happens when his grandson Saitakes it upon himself to give his grandfather the farewell he deserves?
title: Prati Roju Pandaage

overview: Lingababu, a coward, pretends to be brave in order to impress Raaga, the girl he loves. But when a dreaded gangster threatens Raaga's life, he must find the courage to fight and protect her.
title: Lingababu Love Story

overview: A father living on the fringes of a village believes that working is a fool's errand, for the lord takes what little the workers make. When a young woman enters their home, tensions begin to rise and their idle life is threatened. The film is based on the story ‘Kafan’ by Munshi Premchand
title: A Hamlet's Tale

overview: Raghu (Abhiram Daggubati) is a farmer in a remote village and a follower of the principle of Ahimsa (non-violence) taught by Mahatma Gandhi, so much so that even when his girlfriend Ahalya (Geethika Tiwary) — who also happens to be his first cousin — calls for help after being molested, he delivers a moral lesson to the perpetrator in the importance of respecting women.
title: Ahimsa

overview: Captain Avinash marries Amulya in 1971 and immediately called to duty by the Army headquarters. Unfortunately Avinash disappears in a deep valley while chasing the enemy. Somehow Avinash  wakes up in 2021 but his attire and age remains as he was in 1971.
title: Gandharwa

overview: Anand is a cleanliness freak, someone suffering from OCD . What happens when a man like that falls in love? Will the person he loves learn to live with his quirks or will he have to change?
title: Mahanubhavudu

overview: A journalist pieces together the story of Eagle, a former professional sniper who falls in love with Rachana, and on a mission to redeem himself by working towards eradicating illegal arms from this world.
title: Eagle

overview: Chintamani, a courtesan, is a devotee of Lord Vishnu. Her strong faith impresses Lord Vishnu and he decides to help her with her problems.
title: Chintamani
